title: Pixel 4xl shutting down intermittently not turning off untill plugged in to power. Battery not drop
content:
Pixel 4xl shutting down intermittently when idle not turning off untill plugged in to power. Battery not dropping. Seems to be an issue with all Google flagship Pixels, this is my 4th pixel. Everytime an update creates an issue with the phone performance. 
Please advise how to fix 4XL issue.
